title: White Jade
description: You can take the witch out of New York, but you can't take New York out of the witch...  Mina Gideon has returned to Boston to bury her ex-husband, and her past. It should be quick, but for Mina, things are never as simple as they seem. Far from home and taunted by an enemy who seeks to destroy her, Mina will need all her power and focus to protect everything and everyone she loves, but will that be enough?
author: Ande Li
